❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ ho ho ho the holiday season is here and what better way to spread the cheer than by making some quick and easy ornaments with our granny hexagon pattern you can whip up these decorations in no time at all not only are these baubles simple and fast but they re also a great way to use up any leftover yarn you may have lying around these festive ornaments will add a touch of homemade charm to your tree and make great gifts for loved ones so grab your yarn and start creating your very own christmas ornaments that are sure to bring joy and cheer to all > get ready for some crochet fun with > the very merry tweedmas cal hannah > michelle and i are so excited to > celebrate the holidays with you with > our merry little cal you ll have the > chance to learn new stitches and > techniques while creating beautiful > holiday-inspired pieces so grab your > crochet hooks and join in the > excitement > > all of the designs in the very merry > tweedmas collection were created with > a simple and fresh take on the > traditional granny square that you ll > love while this classic crochet > technique may bring to mind images of > your grandmother s cozy blankets it s > time to turn up the excitement with a > fresh twist imagine the dazzling > potential of combining different > colors and textures creating a > stunning masterpiece that is anything > but outdated and with christmas > rapidly approaching what better time > to dive into this craft and create > some holiday gifts for your loved > ones > > get ready to learn new crochet > techniques and create beautiful and > festive projects that will last a > lifetime join us and let s crochet > together > https //www hanjancrochet com/granny-christmas-crochet-along/ our granny hexagon ornaments come with a full pattern and a helpful video tutorial following along has never been easier join our vibrant community of crochet lovers and embark on a holly jolly crochet-along journey ✨ what size ornament can i make ✨ ✔️ there are two different sizes listed - a larger size 4 and a smaller version 2 36 there are two choices of granny hexagon ornaments simply crochet 2 hexagons then we will use a flat slip_stitch to insert the plastic ornament inside and seam this is a quick make and great for a gift if you love granny squares this is a fun project to work up ✨ extra support & tips ✨ ✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube ✔️ join a community of crocheters ✨ what you will need to make a granny hexagon ornament✨ yarn brava tweed worsted 1 97% premium acrylic 3% viscose 218yds/100g weight 4
